did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Files of the University Counsel's Office include records relating to Weill Cornell Medical College, student employment, the Army Training Program, student housing, and real estate transactions, funds and scholarships, contracts, wills and estates, and other legal papers.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Files of the University Counsel's Office include records relating to Weill Cornell Medical College, student employment, the Army Training Program, 1943-1946; student housing, 1954-1959; and real estate transactions, funds and scholarships, contracts, wills and estates, and other legal papers. Also, faculty personnel matters referred to legal counsel; contracts between James A. Perkins and Cornell University, 1963-1970; and correspondence of the University President, Board of Trustees and others regarding the 1969 Challenge to Governance. Also, alphabetical office subject files, 1948-1996.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Cornell University. Joan and Sanford I. Weill Medical College.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Letters concerning resignation of James A. Perkins are closed.
Restricted to permission of office of origin.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell University Counsel Records, #5-3-1960. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
